script:
# script "lisp"
# bgmfile "bgm214_02" "BgmAncientKillers001" 0
# background "ancient_back"
# imageset 0 "bg_white"
# imagealpha 0 1 0
# imagescale 0 3 0
# imagepos 0 0 30
# pos 401711 4
# body 401711
# alpha 401711 0 0
# scale 401711 0.8 0
# pos 103511 2
# body 103511
# alpha 103511 0 0
# scale 103511 0.8 0
# serif 0
# textwindow "close"
# serif 1
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 0.15

# se "SE_9022"
# imagealpha 0 0 2
# serif 0
# textwindow "nomal"
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
@
全知の大樹・ユグドラシルから
“欠落した歴史”が
今再び紐解かれる―

# se "SE_0539"
# envbody 1701 8 0
# effectpattern 1701 1 0
# effectstart 1701
# alpha 401711 1 1
# alpha 103511 0 0
# move 401711 3 0
# scale 401711 0.8 0
# mask 401711 off
# fadein "black" 1
# textflame 0 0
# textsize 28
# textalign "center"
# waitandnext 1
@
七元徳の“勇気”を顕現した
[0000FF]「スイハ」[-]

# se "SE_5509"
# voice 4017 "suiha_battle_0004"
# textflame 0 0
# textsize 28
# textalign "center"
# fadein "white" 0.5
@
七元徳の“勇気”を顕現した
[0000FF]「スイハ」[-]

# se "SE_0539"
# fadein "black" 1
# pos 103511 3
# scale 103511 0.8 0
# alpha 103511 1 1
# alpha 401711 0 0
# mask 103511 off
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# waitandnext 1
@
七元徳の“愛情”を顕現した
[00FF00]「ダモクレス」[-]

# se "SE_0548"
# voice 1035 "damocles_0005"
# textflame 0 0
# textsize 28
# textalign "center"
# fadein "white" 0.5
@
七元徳の“愛情”を顕現した
[00FF00]「ダモクレス」[-]

# se "SE_0602"
# fadein "white" 1
# pos 103511 2
# mask 103511 on
# mask 401711 on
# move 401711 4 0
# scale 401711 0.8 0
# scale 103511 0.8 0
# alpha 401711 1 0
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# voice 1035 "damocles_battle_0004"
# voicedelay 4017 "suiha_0029" 0.8
# face 401711 "happy"
# face 103511 "happy"
@
ふたりの固有スキルは
自身のみならず、
味方のステータスを大幅アップ！

# alpha 401711 1 0
# alpha 103511 0 0
# se "SE_5594"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# move 401711 3 0
# scale 401711 0.8 0
# mask 401711 off
# textflame 0 0
# textsize 28
# textalign "center"
# voice 4017 "suiha_unit_0013"
# face 401711 "normal"
@
スキル[FF0000]『揺るぎなき信念』[-]は
命中を大幅アップ！

# alpha 401711 0 0
# alpha 103511 1 0
# se "SE_5594"
# fadein "white" 0.5
# move 103511 3 0
# scale 103511 0.8 0
# mask 103511 off
# textflame 0 0
# textsize 28
# textalign "center"
# voice 1035 "damocles_kyara_1006"
# face 103511 "happy"
@
スキル[FF0000]『全てを包み込む愛』[-]は
物攻を大幅アップ！

# se "SE_4780"
# fadeout "black" 2
# serif 0
# textwindow "close"
# serif 1
# textwindow "close"
# waitandnext 2

# pos 103611 3
# body 103611
# alpha 103611 0 0
# scale 103611 0.8 0
# pos 502711 3
# body 502711
# alpha 502711 0 0
# scale 502711 0.8 0
# pos 302511 3
# body 302511
# alpha 302511 0 0
# scale 302511 0.8 0
# alpha 401711 0 0
# alpha 103511 0 0
# fadein "black" 1
# serif 0
# textwindow "nomal"
# textalign "center"
# textflame 0 0
@
ピックアップガチャは…

# se "SE_5594"
# alpha 103611 1 0
# fadein "white" 0.5
# scale 103611 0.8 0
# mask 103611 off
# textflame 0 0
# textsize 28
# textalign "center"
# voice 1036 "ragnarok_unit_0005"
# face 103611 "angry"
@
『ラグナロク』

# se "SE_5594"
# alpha 103611 0 0
# alpha 502711 1 0
# fadein "white" 0.5
# scale 502711 0.8 0
# mask 502711 off
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# voice 5027 "freischotz_unit_0013"
# face 502711 "angry"
@
『フライシュッツ』

# move 401711 4 0
# move 103511 2 0
# se "SE_5594"
# alpha 502711 0 0
# alpha 302511 1 0
# fadein "white" 0.5
# scale 302511 0.8 0
# mask 302511 off
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# voice 3025 "minerva_unit_0012"
# face 302511 "angry"
@
『ミネルヴァ』

# se "SE_0602"
# mask 302511 on
# mask 502711 on
# mask 103611 on
# move 302511 1 0
# move 502711 5 0
# layer 103611 3
# layer 302511 2
# layer 502711 2
# fadein "white" 0.5
# scale 302511 0.8 0
# scale 502711 0.8 0
# scale 103611 0.8 0
# alpha 302511 1 0
# alpha 502711 1 0
# alpha 103611 1 0
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
# face 401711 "normal"
# face 103511 "normal"
@
3体のエンシェントキラーズも
[FF0000]登場！！[-]

# fadein "white" 0.5
# mask 401711 on
# mask 103511 on
# alpha 401711 1 0
# alpha 103511 1 0
# alpha 302511 0 0
# alpha 502711 0 0
# alpha 103611 0 0
# voice 4017 "suiha_0005"
# voice 1035 "damocles_0004"
# textflame 0 0
# textalign "center"
@
5月はまだまだこれから！
スキル詳細はお知らせをチェック！
